## Where

Use the following address: [470 Dartmouth Rd NW, Winston-Salem, NC 27104](https://www.google.com/search?q=470+Dartmouth+Rd+NW%2C+Winston-Salem%2C+NC+27104&rlz=1C1EJFC_enUS838US838&oq=470+Dartmouth+Rd+NW%2C+Winston-Salem%2C+NC+27104&aqs=chrome..69i57.176j0j7&sourceid=chrome&ie=UTF-8)

__Park:__ In the dirt lot, fields are down the hill.

```{r map, out.width=6, out.height=300, out.width="100%"}

l <- 
  leaflet(data = whitaker) %>% 
  addTiles() %>%
    addProviderTiles(providers$Esri.WorldImagery) %>%
  addProviderTiles(providers$CartoDB,
    options = providerTileOptions(opacity = 0.75)) %>%
  addMarkers(whitaker$long, 
             whitaker$lat, 
             popup = whitaker$name
             ) %>%
  setView(whitaker$long, 
          whitaker$lat, 
          zoom = 16) 

l
```

* 1 day tournament on a Saturday in late August  
* A short sleeve jersey with a snazzy Summer League logo   
* Friends!
